title: 05/20/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/20/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps the NBA Play-in games with a couple former players. Class of 2021 Basketball Hall of Famer Chris Webber tells us how his reunion with former teammate Jalen Rose came about. Seven time NBA Champion Robert Horry discusses whether he should be in the Hall of Fame or not. And Callaway Golfer Brent Walker, who's participating in the PGA Championship this week, joins Dan to talk about what it's like to play at Kiawah Island.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
